title: Sebi gives illegal trade info on 15,000 entities
content: Continuing efforts to crack down on illegal trading activities, Sebi has shared its findings on nearly 15,000 entities that have indulged in non-genuine trades through illiquid stock options with the income tax (I-T) department and the ministry of corporate affairs, according to a senior official.
contentSnippet: Continuing efforts to crack down on illegal trading activities, Sebi has shared its findings on nearly 15,000 entities that have indulged in non-genuine trades through illiquid stock options with the income tax (I-T) department and the ministry of corporate affairs, according to a senior official.

article.title: Illegal trades: Sebi gives tax dept, government information on 15,000 entities
article.content: Continuing efforts to crack down on illegal trading activities, Sebi has shared its findings on nearly 15,000 entities that have indulged in non-genuine trades through illiquid stock options with the income tax (I-T) department and the ministry of corporate affairs, according to a senior official.
